alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued May 08 at 7:27AM CDT until May 09 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues to be possible. * WHERE...Sugar Creek in Sangamon County, downstream of Spaulding Dam. * WHEN...Through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in areas downstream of the dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall of 3 to 7 inches occurred Sunday and Sunday night occurred across western to southern portions of Sangamon County, across the Lake Springfield watershed. This has caused rapid rises on the lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
